EMF CBE TemplateContentHandlerImpl.java throws 
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException.

When merging the following CBE XML fragment using the 
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.events.cbe.impl.TemplateContentHandlerImpl 
ContentHandler, the following exception is thrown:

java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.util.BasicEList$EIterator.checkModCount
(BasicEList.java:1226)
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.util.BasicEList$EIterator.next
(BasicEList.java:1179)
	at 
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.events.cbe.impl.TemplateContentHandlerImpl.completeEv
ent(TemplateContentHandlerImpl.java:180)
	at 
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.events.cbe.impl.CommonBaseEventImpl.complete
(CommonBaseEventImpl.java:1613)
	at DonsTest.main(DonsTest.java:24)

<CommonBaseEvent msg="Sample event message" extensionName="Sample event 
extension name">
                        <extendedDataElements name="Sample ExtendedDataElement 
name" type="string">
                                <values>Sample ExtendedDataElement 
value</values>
                        </extendedDataElements>
                        <sourceComponentId application="Sample Application" />
                        <situation categoryName="ConfigureSituation">
                                <situationType xsi:type="ConfigureSituation" 
reasoningScope="Sample reasoning scope" successDisposition="UNSUCCESSFUL" />
                        </situation>
</CommonBaseEvent>

The problem is that when an element is retrieved from one EList and added to 
another EList, EMF remove the element automatically from the original EList, 
therefore causing the java.util.ConcurrentModificationException when interating 
the original EList.
TemplateContentHandlerImpl checked in on April 7/04 in HEAD.
